Table1.News title: New CA Safe Schools for All hub gives updates on COVID-19 plan
Table1.News content: This new website for school administrators, staff, and parents outlines the funding, testing, and safety measures the state offers to support safe in-person instruction for California’s kids.
We’ve got answers. The new Travel page says what’s allowed in California, what’s not, and why. If your question is not answered, you can submit it at the bottom of the page.
California has announced the upcoming phases of vaccine distribution. Seniors over 65 and front line workers, including teachers, are next on the priority list.
